metadata.title: Lie To Me
metadata.songInfo: by Bruce McCabe recording of 1997 from Lie To Me (A&M 540640) ,

xml.lyrics:
Lie to me and tell me everything is all right Lie to me and tell me that you'll stay here tonight Tell me that you'll never leave, and I'll just try to make believe, that everything you tell me is true
Lie to me, go ahead and lie to me
Lie to me, it doesn't matter anymore It could never be what it was before If I can't hold on to you, leave me with somethin' I can hold onto, for just a little while won't you let me be
Anyone can see, that you love him more than me But right now, baby, let me pretend, that our love will never end
Lie to me, go ahead and lie to me
